hero.title: Casino de Charlevoix — A Premier Gaming Resort in the Heart of Quebec

history.title: About Casino de Charlevoix
history.description2: Casino de Charlevoix is a stylish and scenic casino in La Malbaie, Quebec, offering a wide range of slot machines, table games, and generous bonuses. Connected to the luxurious Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu, it features progressive jackpots up to C$250,000, themed gaming nights, and a rewarding VIP loyalty program.

customHtml.title: Luxury Gaming and Unforgettable Entertainment in Quebec
customHtml.description:
Casino de Charlevoix is a unique blend of gaming excitement, luxury accommodations, and breathtaking landscapes in Quebec’s Charlevoix region. Nestled on the Pointe-au-Pic hillside and connected to the iconic Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu, this casino offers guests not only thrilling gaming experiences but also world-class leisure. The spacious gaming floor spans over 87,000 square feet and features more than 800 slot machines, including progressive jackpot slots reaching up to C$250,000, along with 20 classic table games such as roulette, blackjack, baccarat, and poker. Minimum bets start at just one cent, making it accessible for every type of player.


For culinary enthusiasts, the property boasts exceptional dining options. Le Saint-Laurent serves refined dishes and brunches, Le Bellerive offers a relaxed atmosphere, and St-Hubert signé Casino is famous for its signature rotisserie chicken and local flavors. Guests can unwind at Bar 21, known for its vibrant vibe and DJ sets, or enjoy live music in the cozy La Brise Bar.


Entertainment is at the heart of Casino de Charlevoix, with Party Mix Nights every Saturday, DJ Battle Fridays, and themed events including comedy shows and seasonal celebrations. Visitors can also take advantage of exclusive getaway packages, from romantic escapes to gourmet experiences and spa treatments featuring massages and hydrotherapy access.


The casino stands out for its generous bonuses and loyalty rewards. New players can claim up to C$2,500 and 125 free spins on popular slots. The Casino Privilèges loyalty program offers four tiers—Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Platinum—each unlocking greater benefits, from complimentary dining and discounts to personal hosts and airfare reimbursements. Points can be redeemed for gaming credits, hotel stays, and show tickets, ensuring every wager brings added value.


Completing the experience, Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu offers 405 Châteauesque-style rooms, a luxurious spa, pools, a fitness center, and a 27-hole golf course. Guests enjoy stunning views of the St. Lawrence River and the Laurentian Mountains, all just a 1 hour 45-minute drive from Quebec City, making it the perfect destination for both relaxation and entertainment.


Rules for Visiting Casino de Charlevoix

Age Requirement

Entry is permitted only to individuals 18 years and older. This is a legal requirement in Quebec. Guests must present valid identification upon arrival.


Identification Documents

A government-issued photo ID is required for entry. Accepted documents include a passport, driver’s license, or official ID card. Without proper ID, access will be denied.


Dress Code

The casino maintains a casual but neat dress code. Sportswear, beachwear, and clothing with offensive language or graphics are not allowed. Guests are encouraged to dress respectfully to maintain the elegant atmosphere.


Food and Alcohol

Bringing outside food or beverages into the casino is strictly prohibited. Guests can enjoy drinks and meals at the on-site bars and restaurants.


Guest Condition

Entry will be denied to anyone who appears to be intoxicated or under the influence of drugs. The casino reserves the right to refuse service to maintain a safe and respectful environment.


Operating Hours

The casino is open daily, with slot machines available 24/7. Table game hours may vary, so it’s recommended to check the schedule in advance.

Responsible Gaming

Casino de Charlevoix promotes responsible gambling. Staff may intervene or restrict access to games if a guest shows signs of addiction or disruptive behavior.


Casino Privilèges Loyalty Program at Casino de Charlevoix

Every time you play slots, table games, or make purchases at the casino’s bars and restaurants, you earn Privilèges Points. These points can be redeemed for gaming credits, complimentary meals, show tickets, and even stays at the luxurious Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu.


Membership Levels

  • • Bronze – Entry-level status available upon registration.
  • • Privileges Plus – Achieved with approximately $1,600 in slot play within 12 months.
  • • Prestige – Requires around $35,000 in wagers.
  • • Prestige Plus – The top tier, unlocked with about $400,000 in annual play.

Exclusive Benefits

Members enjoy 15% discounts at casino restaurants and bars, special hotel offers, and invitations to VIP events, tournaments, and private parties. Higher tiers unlock premium perks such as a personal host, airfare reimbursement, birthday bonuses, free parking, and priority reservations. The more you play, the more rewards you earn.

customHtml_2.title: Casino de Charlevoix: Where Gaming Meets World-Class Entertainment
customHtml_2.description:
Casino du Lac-Leamy bonuses and promotions


Welcome Bonuses for New Players

  • • 200% bonus up to C$1,000 on your first deposit
  • • 150% up to C$750 on the second
  • • 100% up to C$500 on the third
  • • 50% up to C$250 on the fourth
  • • Plus 125 free spins on popular slot games

Progressive Jackpots

Slot machines feature progressive jackpots that can reach C$250,000 or more. Games like Huff N’ Even More Puff™ and Rich Little Hens™ offer bonus rounds, free spins, and the chance to win big even with small bets.

Table Game Specials

  • • Mississippi Stud Poker offers payouts up to 500x bet
  • • Free Bet Blackjack includes free double-downs
  • • Ultimate Texas Hold’em and 3 Card Poker feature unique combinations and bonus payouts

Promotions and Tournaments

  • • Drops & Wins 2025: Daily prizes, weekly spins, and a prize pool of over C$6.3 million
  • • Live Casino Tournaments: Regular events with cash prizes and VIP rewards
  • • Seasonal Promotions: Bonuses for holidays, birthdays, and special occasions

Popular games at Casino de Charlevoix

Slot Machines

Casino de Charlevoix features over 900 slot machines from top providers like IGT, Bally, WMS, and iSoftBet. Bets start from just $0.10, and many machines offer progressive jackpots reaching up to C$250,000. Popular titles include:

  • • Huff N’ Even More Puff™ – with bonus rounds and progressive jackpots
  • • Rich Little Hens™ – featuring free spins and multipliers
  • • Cleopatra Plus, Fire Burner, Triple Cash Wheel, and Montezuma Megaways – all with RTPs around 95%

Table Games

The casino offers around 20 classic table games, including:

  • • Blackjack – with variants like Free Bet Blackjack offering free double downs
  • • Roulette – both European and American styles
  • • Baccarat – traditional hand comparison game
  • • Mississippi Stud Poker – with payouts up to 500x your bet
  • • Ultimate Texas Hold’em and 3 Card Poker – poker games with bonus payouts

Electronic Table Games

For solo play or learning, electronic versions of table games are available. These allow guests to play poker, blackjack, and roulette on interactive screens with flexible game switching.


Keno and Video Poker

Casino de Charlevoix also offers Keno, Video Poker, and multi-game stations, allowing players to switch between slots, table games, and other options without changing machines.


Casino de Charlevoix: Minimum and Maximum Betting Limits

Whether you're a casual player or a high roller, Casino de Charlevoix offers flexible betting options across its wide range of games. Below is a detailed overview of the minimum and maximum bets allowed:


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines C$0.10 C$100+
Video Poker C$0.25 C$50
Electronic Roulette C$1 C$500
Blackjack (Free Bet) C$5 C$1,000
Mississippi Stud Poker C$10 C$500 (up to 500x win)
Ultimate Texas Hold’em C$10 C$1,000+
Baccarat C$25 C$5,000
3 Card Poker C$10 C$500
Progressive Slot Machines C$0.25 Jackpots up to C$250,000

Events at Casino de Charlevoix

Special Events and Shows

One of the most anticipated events is “Loto-Québec fait son Juste pour rire”, an annual comedy festival held every August. For three weeks, the casino hosts free comedy shows in the unique cabaret-style venue Le Hangar. The program includes:

  • • Comedy Club Nights – Stand-up performances every Thursday and Friday.
  • • Mystery Shows – Saturdays feature surprise headliners revealed only at showtime.
  • • Favourites Night – Sundays showcase well-known and beloved comedians.

The festival also offers an outdoor giant screen, food trucks, an open-air bar, and vibrant lighting, creating a festive atmosphere.


Nightlife and Music Parties

The casino’s Bar 21 is the hotspot for nightlife, featuring:

  • • Party Mix Nights – Every Saturday with live DJs spinning until late.
  • • DJ Battle Fridays – From October to November, eight DJs compete for the resident spot, with winners chosen by the audience and judges.
  • • Special Music Nights – Themed parties for Halloween, New Year’s Eve, and other holidays.

Live Music and Performances

Throughout the year, the Les Grands Spectacles Petit Manoir du Casino series brings top artists like Roch Voisine, Fouki, and Annie Villeneuve, along with tribute shows honoring Kiss, Bryan Adams, and more.


Seasonal and Themed Events

  • • Halloween parties with costumes, contests, and live music.
  • • New Year’s Eve celebrations featuring fireworks and gourmet dinners.
  • • Spring and summer festivals with street performers, markets, and food zones.
  • • Charity events, such as water challenges for fundraising.

Luxury Dining, Relaxation, and Entertainment at Casino de Charlevoix

Casino de Charlevoix is more than just a gaming destination — it’s a complete resort experience that combines fine dining, elegant accommodations, and vibrant entertainment in the heart of Quebec’s scenic Charlevoix region. Whether you're visiting for the thrill of the games or the tranquility of the surroundings, the casino offers a refined atmosphere where leisure and luxury meet.


Guests can indulge in a variety of culinary experiences without leaving the property. The casino features several restaurants, each offering a distinct ambiance and menu. Le Saint-Laurent serves gourmet cuisine with breathtaking views of the St. Lawrence River, while Le Bellerive provides a relaxed setting ideal for casual meals and family gatherings. For those craving comfort food, St-Hubert signé Casino delivers Quebec’s iconic rotisserie chicken and BBQ specialties in a modern, welcoming space. Bars like Bar 21 and La Brise Bar offer handcrafted cocktails, local wines, and live music, creating the perfect setting for socializing after a day of gaming.


Connected directly to the casino is the prestigious Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu, a five-star hotel that blends historic charm with contemporary comfort. With over 400 rooms, a full-service spa, indoor and outdoor pools, and a 27-hole golf course, the hotel is a destination in itself. Guests can enjoy panoramic views of the Laurentian Mountains and the St. Lawrence River, making it an ideal retreat for couples, families, and business travelers alike.


Entertainment is a key part of the Casino de Charlevoix experience. Throughout the year, the resort hosts themed parties, comedy nights, live concerts, and seasonal festivals. Events like DJ Battle Fridays and Party Mix Nights bring energy to the casino floor, while special shows in the Le Hangar cabaret venue showcase top comedians and musical acts. Whether you're dancing the night away or enjoying a quiet evening with live jazz, there’s always something happening.


For those seeking relaxation, the resort offers wellness packages that include spa treatments, gourmet dining, and access to thermal pools. Guests can also take advantage of exclusive promotions and loyalty rewards through the Casino Privilèges program, which offers discounts, free meals, and VIP access to events.


Casino de Charlevoix is a destination where entertainment, elegance, and excitement come together. From luxurious hotel stays and fine dining to thrilling games and unforgettable shows, every visit promises a rich and memorable experience.

items.title: Do I need to book my visit in advance?
items.answer: No, booking is not required, but it is recommended for events and hotel accommodations.

items.title: What security measures are in place?
items.answer: The casino uses video surveillance, on-site security, and data protection systems to ensure guest safety.

items.title: Can I pay with a card?
items.answer: Yes, major credit and debit cards are accepted.

items.title: Can I stay near the casino?
items.answer: Yes, the casino is connected to the luxurious Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu hotel, where you can book a room.
